item.title: TGS Podcast #30 ft. Jarett Cale, Hosted by TotalBiscuit, Jesse Cox & Dodger
item.description:
In the 30th edition of the TGS Podcast the exciting Jarett Cale of Pure Pwnage joins your merry band of hosts, Total Biscuit, Jesse Cox and Dodger!

-----------------------------------------------------

Subscribe to TGS for new Podcasts every week: http://goo.gl/OvwIY

Watch more TGS Podcasts here: http://bit.ly/TGSPodcast

Dowload on iTunes here: http://bit.ly/PodcastItunes

RSS feed: http://thegamestation.libsyn.com/rss

- - - - -
ARTICLES:
Joe Madureira Leaves Vigil Games - http://www.giantbomb.com/news/darksiders-creative-director-joe-madureira-leaving-vigil-games/4424/
Star Citizen Kickstarter - http://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2012/10/24/star-citizen-whomps-its-kickstarter-goal-in-five-days/
EA Wants To Be Like Apple, Google and Facebook - http://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2012-10-25-ea-wants-its-peers-to-be-apple-google-facebook-not-take-two-activision-and-ubisoft
New Mass Effect Movie Screenwriter - http://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2012-10-25-mass-effect-movie-gets-new-screenwriter
Zynga Lay-offs - http://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2012-10-23-zynga-lays-off-over-a-hundred-during-apples-press-conference-earlier-today-report

TRAILERS:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tRmDY3gLKp4
Cargo Commande (Nov 1st)r: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZIoFaCNS278
Patterns (Q4 2013): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gJeD9nwm43o
Frozen Hearth (Nov 23rd): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vEyqPV64VxM

FEATURING:
TotalBiscuit http://youtube.com/TotalHalibut
Dodger http://youtube.com/PressHeartToContinue
Jesse Cox http://youtube.com/OMFGCata
Jarett Cale http://www.indiegogo.com/purepwnage
Twitter - @jarettcale
